column4: hello would anyone be able to help me download a .tgz program
how do i install a .tgz file
extract by 'tar xvf filename', read the install file; it's usually source and needs a manual compile
but it is manual compiling, if they offer another package, it'd be easier
tar: Tibia870.tgz: Cannot open: No such file or directory
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
Please, if someone sees my question, raise your hand.
how do i tar xvf something the file name is Tibia870.tgz
can you open a terminal and do this: cd path/to/the/tar/file/directory/
